text: Hagi e'i ana knama fore'ma haniana tusi'a hanintiri hanigeno, komanetigeno agonaregama rumsama nehiankna huno hanavenentake sondia vahe'mo'za ruherafiramiza egahaze. Anama hanazana kora anahukna zana forera osu'neanknaza fore hugahiankino, henka'a forehu anante anante'ma hu'za vanaza vahepina, anahukna zana forera osugahie.
